scripts.deploy-prod: npm install && npm run build && npx gh-pages -d dist -b prod
scripts.deploy-test: npm install && npm run build && del-cli "dist/assets/images/backgrounds/*" "!dist/assets/images/backgrounds/1.jpg" "!dist/assets/images/backgrounds/backgrounds.json" && del-cli "dist/assets/videos/backgrounds/*" "!dist/assets/videos/backgrounds/1.mp4" && npx gh-pages -d dist -b test
